title: Ukraine crisis: Could India cut its defence ties with Russia?
description: India has been under pressure to distance itself from Russia over Ukraine, including reducing defence ties.

title: How much plastic do you use in a week?

title: First-class degrees more than double in a decade
description: Nearly 38% of students were awarded the top grade in 2020-21, the university watchdog says.

title: Superhero comparison for nurses 'unhelpful'
description: Wales' chief nurse says expectations are unrealistic for an exhausted workforce.

description: People spent less in shops and cut down on car journeys leading to the economy shrinking in March.

description: The 19th Century egg-laying mammal samples supported Darwin's theory of evolution.
